TopicTitle: “.png “ File Is Not Deleted When Deleting A Workspace

Articles.Content:
Reported Version: v0.1.5 (latest) | Mods: none | Can replicate without mods? Yes 
OS: Windows 10 Professionnel | CPU: i9-13900KF | GPU: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 3070 | RAM: 64GB DDR5 5600MHz

 

Specs: irrelevant for this bug  

Severity: low (just take HD space)  

Frequency: high (always)  

Description: There are 3 files for each workspace saved in the "workspaces" folder (.json, .meta and .png) but the .png file is not deleted when deleting a ship

Edited October 29, 2023 by The Space Peacock
